ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $User.Bypass_User_Validations__c = False, RecordType.Name = "Private Equity - TMT", TEXT ( Status_TMT__c ) <> "Portfolio", OR ( TEXT ( Status_TMT__c ) = "Advanced", TEXT ( Status_TMT__c ) = "Active" ) , ISNEW(), ISBLANK ( DC__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Deal Team Contact to be shown for JYB/SCN Reporting.
